data.text: @nzherald Good on them this fear mongering about not traveling is stupid

@FrogmarchWasp4 @nzherald Because there's a big beautiful world to see you been to South East Asia beautiful culture warm hospitable people great food great weather.

Whilst I agree we do have it good here staying in New Zealand your whole life how boring and Australia is not included thats a bigger NZ
@nzherald Why would anyone want to go overseas? We've got it pretty sweet here in NZ.
